definition: lit. the trees long for peace but the wind will never cease (idiom)/fig. the world changes, whether you want it or not
pinyin: shu4 yu4 jing4 er2 feng1 bu4 zhi3

definition: many times/on more than one occasion
while there is life, the fight continues (idiom); to fight to the last
pinyin: sheng1 ming4 bu4 xi1 , zhan4 dou4 bu4 zhi3

sentences.english: The lucky winner enjoys his choice of wives and lovers.
sentences.chinese: 幸運的優勝者可以有權選擇不止一位妻子和愛人。

sentences.english: More than once I've felt my heart slip a cog.
sentences.chinese: 我不止一次感到心臟突然停跳一下。

sentences.english: Alucard: Mankind continues to fight, but it is a desperate fight to stay alive.
sentences.chinese: 人類依舊爭鬥不止，其生命本身便是一場絕望的戰鬥。

sentences.english: They have developed the ability to move rather than just drift, jetting at up to four knots through the water.
sentences.chinese: 它們不止漂浮，還能遊動，在水中噴射至四海里。

sentences.english: In fact, the pattern contains the seeds of more than just hiding remoteness.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，該模式的作用遠不止隱藏遠程性。

sentences.english: So if you wanted to read Isaiah, it actually was more than one scroll.
sentences.chinese: 所以如果你想讀以賽亞書，它實際上不止一卷。

sentences.english: "People can love more than once," Person assures me.
sentences.chinese: “每個人可以不止愛一次”，珀森向我保證說。

sentences.english: But the list could be much longer.
sentences.chinese: 但是名單可能遠不止這麼長。

sentences.english: Do you need to have more than one client type access shared data?
sentences.chinese: 你需要不止一種類型的客戶端訪問共享數據嗎？

sentences.english: Slowly it fluttered down to the earth, with its life-blood pouring out of it.
sentences.chinese: 他慢慢拍著翅膀往下墜落，血流不止。

sentences.english: Duggan appears to have known police were not just following him, but were going to stop him.
sentences.chinese: 達根似乎知道警方打算截住他而不止是要跟蹤他。

sentences.english: An interface will usually consist of more than one service signature.
sentences.chinese: 一個接口通常由不止一個的服務簽名組成。

sentences.english: Kids, there's more than one story of how I met your mother.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們，在我遇到你老媽前風流韻事不止一次。

sentences.english: Holmes chuckled and wriggled in his chair, as was his habit when in high spirits.
sentences.chinese: 福爾摩斯在椅子上扭動着身子，大笑不止。

sentences.english: It's much more than that. It is also a geostrategic and development issue.
sentences.chinese: 這遠不止是人權問題，這也是地緣政治和發展問題。

sentences.english: Great. However, a high sodium intake affects far more than that.
sentences.chinese: 但是，鈉的高攝入對人的影響遠不止血壓方面。

definition: not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
apart from this/in addition to this
(coll.) As a matter of fact, ... (used to introduce evidence for what one has just asserted)
